verbose_text: Similarly, the protein expression of Bcl-2 was markedly decreased (p < 0.01; XREF_FIG), Bax protein expression was significantly increased (p < 0.01; XREF_FIG), and the Bcl-2 / Bax ratio was significantly decreased (p < 0.01; XREF_FIG) in vehicle treated group compared to the sham operated group.
